message: I think this is a fair starting point, but we can negotiate further if you disagree.
Let's split it a bit more evenly. This offer ensures we both benefit significantly.
I'm willing to compromise. This offer is closer to your last proposal but still gives me a fair share. Let's agree on this and avoid further losses due to inflation.
Alice, time is running out, and we're both losing money. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
